attributes.action: If we are to review the cost of Public Services, we wish an Independent review into the UK Benefits System and prosecutions of those that abuse it.
attributes.additional_details:
We are reviewing Public Services at every angle, Emergency Services are being cut and and savings made in ALL aspects of valuable work. The benefits system is regually abused by large proportions of people.  If we are to review Public Services, then the Benefit system must also be independently reviewed and the law changed or further powers given to investigate and prosecute people who abuse a system designed to help people.

It is not fair that people in Public Service who risk there lifes for the public, have their pay and conditions changed whilst those on benefits do not.
